name: No Discipline
description:
Discipline is always at 100%.

This mod has been tested with B128, 2022.1, 2024.1, 2025.1.
This mod works with existing savegames and does not alter game state (except set discipline to 100%).

Note: This breaks Discipline portion of the Patrol Tutorial.

Source for this mod is available here.
https://github.com/shole/uboat-mods
author: shole
